name: 翁文慧
objective:
本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
Key features: 
*Fully integrated approach to the molecular aspects of human genetics, genomics, and cell biology.
*The textbook  we selected is good for upper-level undergraduates and graduate students, and a ‘go-to’ book for those studying human molecular genetics or genomics courses.

scorePolicy:
上課將以圓桌座談討論方式逐章進行
每一章節將由1-2位學員先作一詳解
其他學員再針對其現有的實驗經驗加以配合內容討論
本課程較著重分生臨床實驗室經驗分享與遺傳基因基礎知識的結合
因此對象以具備實驗室經驗及分子生物學基礎之學員為主要考慮對象
The class will be conducted chapter by chapter in a round table discussion
Each chapter will be presented in details by 1 or 2 participants.
The  others have to discuss the content according to their experimental experiences
This course focuses on the clinical laboratory experience sharing and basic knowledge of genetics. Therefore, participants with laboratory experiences and molecular biology basis are most welcome.
